Privacy Policy

Last Updated: May 06, 2025

Introduction

At DataHive.co.in, operated by DataHive , we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you use our website, services, or make payments through our payment gateway, Razorpay. By using our services, you agree to the terms outlined in this policy.

Information We Collect

We collect the following types of information:

  • Personal Information: When you sign up for our lead generation services, purchase premium leads, or engage with our customer nurturing tools, we collect your name, email address, phone number, and billing address.
  • Payment Information: For payment processing, we collect necessary details through Razorpay, such as transaction data. We do not store your credit card, debit card, or bank account details on our servers.
  • Lead and Customer Data: As part of our lead prospecting and customer funnel services, we may collect business-related data such as company details, industry preferences, and prospect interactions.
  • Usage Data: We collect information about your interactions with our site, including IP address, browser type, pages visited, and timestamps, to improve our services.

How We Use Your Information

We use your information for the following purposes:

  • Service Delivery: To provide lead generation, customer nurturing strategies, and premium data solutions, including access to our 100 cr database for trading and sales leads.
  • Payment Processing: We use Razorpay to securely process payments. Your payment data is encrypted and handled per PCI-DSS standards.
  • Communication: To send updates, newsletters, or alerts about your leads, customer nurturing campaigns, or transactions. You can opt out of non-essential communications by clicking the unsubscribe link in our emails.
  • Analytics: To analyze user behavior and improve our platform’s functionality, such as optimizing our CRM lead-to-opportunity process.

Payment Processing with Razorpay

We use Razorpay as our payment gateway to process all transactions securely. Razorpay adheres to PCI-DSS standards to protect your payment information. We do not store your card data on our servers; it is encrypted and managed by Razorpay. For more details, please refer to Razorpay’s Privacy Policy.

Data Sharing and Consent

We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties except:

  • With Razorpay, to process payments (with your explicit consent).
  • With service providers who assist in lead generation or customer nurturing, only with your consent and for the purpose of delivering our services.
  • As required by law or to comply with legal obligations.

Before sharing any data with merchants or partners (e.g., for lead nurturing campaigns), we obtain your explicit consent through secure OTP verification or opt-in mechanisms.

Data Security

We implement industry-standard measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access, correct, or delete your personal information by contacting us at support@datahive.co.in.
  • Opt out of marketing communications at any time.
  • Request erasure of your data, after which we will delete all stored information from our servers, except where required by law.
